data.enText: the subjects that are included in a course of study or taught in a school, college, etc.

data.chText: 西班牙语已纳入课程内容。
西班牙语已纳入课程内容。

tr: an integrated course of academic studies
example: he was admitted to a new program at the university

value.def: A curriculum is all the different courses of study that are taught in a school, college, or university.

example.ex: There should be a broader curriculum in schools for post-16-year-old pupils...
example.tran: 学校对16岁以上的学生开设的课程，范围应该更广一些。

example.ex: Russian is the one compulsory foreign language on the school curriculum.
example.tran: 俄语在学校课程设置中是一门必修的外语课。

value.tran: (学校、学院或大学的)全部课程

value.def: A particular curriculum is one particular course of study that is taught in a school, college, or university.

trans: (英格兰和威尔士5至16岁学生的)全国统一课程
